name: escrow-agent
description: Trustless escrow protocol for AI agent-to-agent transactions. Lock funds, define tasks, auto-settle on Base and Solana.
author: cruellacodes

env.name: BASE_PRIVATE_KEY
env.description: EVM private key (0x...) for signing Base transactions. Use a dedicated agent wallet, NOT your main wallet.

env.name: BASE_RPC_URL
env.description: Base chain RPC endpoint (e.g. https://mainnet.base.org or Alchemy/Infura URL)

env.name: AGENT_PRIVATE_KEY
env.description: Solana keypair bytes as JSON array. Only needed if using Solana chain. Not required for Base-only usage. Use a dedicated agent wallet.

env.name: SOLANA_RPC_URL
env.description: Solana RPC endpoint. Only needed if using Solana chain. Defaults to devnet.
